attributes.comment:
I respectfully urge that fees not be increased for the following petitions and
services obtained through United States Citizenship and Immigration Services:
1. I-600/600A, Petition to Classify Orphan as an Immediate Relative
2. N-565, Application for Replacement of Certificate of Citizenship
3. N-600, Application for Certificate of Citizenship
4. Biometric Services

As you know, the above petitions and services are required for U.S. citizens
adopting foreign-born children and bringing them home to the United States.
These are often citizens who have already undergone tremendous financial and
emotional strain to bring a child into their lives, and the proposed fee increases --
at an average of 66% -- only put the dream of parenthood that much further out of
reach for Americans of low and middle incomes. These citizens go to great
lengths to secure the extensive funding necessary for adoption, and every increase
in costs pushes adoption, and thus parenthood, beyond the realm of possibility for
more families.

Please do not increase fees for the above listed petitions and services, which
would be to the detriment of hopeful, would-be parents. Thank you very much for
your consideration.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Anonymous
